metadata.title: CVE-2021-3200 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow vulnerability in libsolv 2020-12-13 via the Solver * testcase_read(Pool *pool, FILE *fp, const char *testcase, Queue *job, char **resultp, int *resultflagsp function at src/testcase.c: line 2334, which could cause a denial of service

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3200` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsolv-perl - 0.7.17-1
libsolv-tools - 0.7.17-1
libsolv1 - 0.7.17-1
libsolvext1 - 0.7.17-1
python3-solv - 0.7.17-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsolv package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.17-1').
